path: artifacts/MiniUSDC Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.MiniUSDC: contracts/MiniUSDC Full Smart Contract Security Audit/MiniUSDC

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees, which may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the addresses list is long.
